featured.text: The economic crisis may have also played a role: Homeowners who were not able to pay their bank loans were forced to abandon their properties, sometimes leaving behind swimming pools that made excellent mosquito breeding grounds.

other.text: Then, the tortoise carries the hare and swims to the 38 bank of the river.

definition.zh_def: 銀行：提供金融服務的機構，包括存款、貸款和其他金融交易。
definition.en_def: A financial institution that accepts deposits from the public and provides loans and other financial services.
definition.example: I need to go to the bank to withdraw some money.
